LanguageData.DeflectChanceEx: Determines how often this weapon returns projectiles back at the attacker.
LanguageData.MaxDeflectChanceEx: For each point in {0}, the user gains a {1} chance of deflecting the projectile back the target. {2} is the maximum possible deflection chance.
LanguageData.DeflectChancePerLevelEx: For each level in {0}, the user gains this much % chance to deflect a projectile.
LanguageData.StatsReport_DeflectionExplanation: Stat is displayed in the following format: Deflection chance equals ( Base chance + ( Skill Level * % per Skill Level) / Manipulation Efficiency
LanguageData.CompVehicle_CannotSplitWhileInVehicles: Cannot split caravan while colonists are in vehicles.
LanguageData.MessageCaravanRunOutOfFuel: {0} has run out of fuel ({1}). {0} will now move at a quarter of normal speed.
LanguageData.MessagePawnLeftVehicle: {0} has left the vehicle ({1}) due to {2} needs.
LanguageData.DaysWorthOfFuelTooltip:
An approximate number of days before the caravan runs out of fuel.
This takes into account all vehicles in the caravan and shows the worst case scenario. This means that after this many days, at least one vehicle will be out of fuel.
LanguageData.DaysWorthOfFuelWarningDialog_NoFuel:
Your caravan isn't carrying fuel and will be unable to travel at full speed.
Are you sure you want to form this caravan?
LanguageData.DaysWorthOfFuelWarningDialog:
Your caravan is only carrying {0} days worth of fuel and will run out of fuel very quickly.
Are you sure you want to form this caravan?
LanguageData.CompVehicle_DisabledDesc: The vehicle disabled, destroyed, or simply too damaged and cannot be loaded.
LanguageData.JecsTools_WorldObjectConst_AbandonReason: because no caravan is available at this location
LanguageData.JecsTools_WorldObjectConst_NotEnoughThin: Missing Specific Items. Need {1}x {2}, have only {0}
LanguageData.JecsTools_WorldObjectConst_NotEnoughReso: Failed to build {0} due to lack of resources
